user_prompt:

  },
  "shapes": [
    {
      "type": "square_small",
      "vertices": [
        "-1,1",
        "1,1",
        "1,-1",
        "-1,-1"
      ]
    },
    {
      "type": "triangle_equilateral_small",
      "vertices": [
        "0,3",

    },

      "vertices": [
        "0,-3",
        "1,-1",
        "-1,-1"
      ]
    },
    {
      "type": "triangle_equilateral_small",
      "vertices": [
        "3,0",
        "1,1",
        "1,-1"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Player-invented recipe. Create an appropriate item."
}

Return ONLY the JSON item definition, no extra text.

Examples:

Example 1 Input:
{
  "recipeId": "enchanting_sharpness_basic",
  "enchantmentId": "sharpness_1",
  "stationTier": 1,
  "stationType": "enchanting",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "fire_crystal",
      "quantity": 4,
      "materialName": "Fire Crystal",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Orange-red crystal pulsing with trapped flames. Warm to touch, occasionally sparks.",
      "materialTags": [
        "elemental",
        "fire",
        "common"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "granite",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Granite",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Speckled igneous rock with visible crystalline structure. Harder than limestone, more reliable for load-bearing structures.",
      "materialTags": [
        "basic",
        "stone",
        "durable"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "iron_ingot",
      "quantity": 3,
      "materialName": "Iron Ingot",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Moderately conductive, somewhat malleable when heated. The workhorse of civilization - reliable, abundant, essential for weapons, tools, and armor.",
      "materialTags": [
        "refined",
        "metal",
        "standard"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "tin_ore",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Tin Ore",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Soft, silvery-white metal with a mysterious sheen that glows faintly in moonlight. Ancient texts speak of its lunar affinity.",
      "materialTags": [
        "basic",
        "metal",
        "magical"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Basic sharpening enchantment using fire crystals. The edge never dulls."
}

Example 1 Output:
{
  "enchantmentId": "sharpness_1",
  "name": "",
  "applicableTo": [
    "weapon"
  ],
  "effect": {
    "type": "damage_multiplier",
    "value": 0.1,
    "stackable": false,
    "conflictsWith": [
      "sharpness_2",
      "sharpness_3"
    ]
  },
  "metadata": {
    "narrative": "Basic sharpening enchantment using fire crystals. The edge never dulls.",
    "tags": [
      "weapon",
      "damage",
      "basic"
    ]
  }
}

Example 2 Input:
{
  "recipeId": "enchanting_durability_basic",

  "stationType": "enchanting",

      "quantity": 4,

      "materialTags": [
        "monster",
        "common",
        "carapace"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "earth_crystal",
      "quantity": 4,
      "materialName": "Earth Crystal",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Green-brown crystal with swirling sediment. Surprisingly heavy, grounds magical energies.",
      "materialTags": [
        "elemental",
        "earth",
        "common"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Basic durability enchantment. Items last longer before needing repair."
}
